films.description: A former sex-worker seeks a new life for herself and her son, only to find the past is not easily left behind, in this operatic tragedy anchored by Anna Magnani.

films.description: A man is permanently injured in an oil rig accident, leaving his adoring wife wracked with guilt, willing to do anything to restore her marriage and relationship with God. films.description: A mother returns from the dead to confront unfinished business with her daughters, who are embroiled in their own emotional turmoil and entwined dramatics. films.title: A young woman seeks revenge for the death of her sister, only to be drawn

films.description: The true story of Argentine socialite Camila O’Gorman and her scandalous desire for a Jesuit priest, captured with empathy, heat and righteous anger. films.description: Join us as we explore the range of films that Terence Davies didn’t get to make. Dear Bud: The Creative Mind of Terence Davies Edge Hill University, the repository of the Terence Davies Archive, curates a free exhibition of previously unseen materials from Davies’ personal archive and the archive of production company Hurricane Films.
